purpose: Initializes the program by accepting current date values and opening input files INFILE1 and INFILE2, setting status flags accordingly.
Reads a record from INFILE1 and moves it to the PENDING-AUTH-SUMMARY area if successful, otherwise sets END-ROOT-SEG-FILE flag on EOF.
Reads a record from INFILE2, validates ROOT-SEG-KEY, sets child segment data and qualification key for IMS insertion if successful, or sets end-of-file flag on EOF.
Closes both INFILE1 and INFILE2 and displays error messages if either file fails to close.
Terminates the program with a return code of 16 upon encountering a critical error during file opening in initialization.
Abends the program with return code 16 when an input file fails to open.
Inserts a root segment into the IMS database using data read from INFILE1.
Abends the program if the root segment insertion fails with an unexpected IMS status code.
Inserts a child segment into the IMS database after reading and qualifying with the root key from INFILE2.
Performs an IMS insert call to insert a child segment after successfully retrieving the parent root segment.
Abends the program with return code 16 when the GU call to the root segment fails.
Abends the program with return code 16 when the ISRT call for the child segment fails.
